name: Heaven - Epic Game Jam 2022 - As Above, So Below
name_original: Heaven - Epic Game Jam 2022 - As Above, So Below
description:
This is my submission for the 2022 Epic Game Jam, based on the theme "As Above, So Below."  It is a short puzzle game using a handful of store-bought assets.  Everything not listed below was done by me!

Thanks to Isaac and Benson for testing.
Thanks to Benson for trailer editing.

Uses these assets from the marketplace:
Lowpoly Style Asia Environment

Low Poly Medieval Interior and Constructions

RPG FX Starter Pack

Footsteps Sounds with Blueprint Setup

As well as audio assets from WeLoveIndies!
